Akla was a monk at the Monastery of the Yellow Rose.
In 1491 DR, Akla was one of the monks kidnapped by cultists of the Cult of the Howling Hatred, who planned to use them in a plot to access an elemental node. In one of the rooms of the node complex under the monastery, she was kept in the custody of some gargoyles until an adventuring party hired by Grandmaster Perrywinkle Shin to find the missing monks defeated the gargoyles and freed her.
